name: This City Needs Me
description:
Just another night in the life of Xeno City's resident anti-hero...

Use WASD or swipe to move. Full screen view recommended.

  • Story and visual assets by me
  • Created using Bitsy, a small game-making tool by Adam LeDoux
  • Features "Paint It Black" by The Rolling Stones, performed by 8-Bit Grizzly
